attributes.action: Harsher sentences for animal cruelty, thorough investigations for missing pets
attributes.additional_details:
Dogs are being stolen and taken to be murdered and made to fight. This needs to end.
We need new laws on animal cruelty so people stop loosing their pets.
attributes.background: Prison sentences for animal cruelty and killing of people’s loved pets. Also, complete investigations of missing and stolen animals as if it was a child. There has been so many dogs going missing and nothing is being done. The people have been known and police done nothing.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300644

Decisions on how to investigate cases are a matter for the police and not the UK Government and Parliament.
